'''"The Silent Meditator"''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "The Silent Meditator" is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] in [[Natlan]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a [[Remarkable Chest]] in [[Tezcatepetonco Range]], west of [[Stadium of the Sacred Flame]].
